titleStmt.title: A sermon preach'd to the Society, for reformation of manners at Kingstone upon Thames, on July 17th 1700. Publish'd at the request of the Society. By Daniel Mayo, M.A. minister of the gospel in that town.
titleStmt.author: Mayo, Daniel, 1672?-1733.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for John Lawrence at the Angel in the Poultry,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Dr. Williams' Library, London.
